query:
SELECT 
  po.id AS orderId,
  po.orderNumber,
  poi.id AS itemId,
  poi.productId,
  poi.inventoryId,
  poi.requestedQuantity,
  i.batch
FROM pickingOrderItems poi
JOIN pickingOrders po ON poi.pickingOrderId = po.id
LEFT JOIN inventory i ON poi.inventoryId = i.id
WHERE po.status != 'cancelled'
ORDER BY po.id DESC, poi.productId, poi.id
LIMIT 20;
